title: The Warriorr
subtitle: Telugu Action 2022
description: Tormented by the city's medical mafia and its kingpin, Guru, Dr Satya flees the city. However, he returns as a powerful police officer to put an end to Guru.

title: Janmashtami Utsav 2022
subtitle: Starplus Hindi Reality
description: Igniting the festive spirit, join your favourite stars as they grace the special event to celebrate the auspicious occasion of Krishna Janmashtami.

title: Anupama
subtitle: Starplus Hindi Drama
description: Despite the many challenges thrown her way, Anupama begins a new chapter of her life post-divorce. Head held always high, what's waiting for her next?

title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin
subtitle: Starplus Hindi Romance
description: Going beyond the chains of duty, Virat has fallen in love with Sai. But will an obsessed Pakhi let go of his broken promises?

title: Mission Mangal
subtitle: Hindi Drama 2019
description: Based on the true story of India's finest scientists who rose above hardships and failures to make us the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.
